qr_code.message: This "QR Code" is a unique identifier for your {{communityName}} account and can be used at the main gate instead of writing your contact information manually. Our goal is to provide fast, easy and secure access.
qr_code.tilisi_message: This "QR Code" is a unique identifier for your {{communityName}} account and can be used to quickly look up your account instead of writing your contact information manually.

misc.visiting_hours: Please note the main gate visiting hours:
